TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CimInstanceAdapter extends System.Management.Automation.PSPropertyAdapter
Public NotInheritable Class CimInstanceAdapter Inherits PSPropertyAdapter

Docs.summary: Adapter that deals with CimInstance objects.
Docs.remarks:
Implementing the PropertyOnlyAdapter for the time being as CimInstanceTypeAdapter currently supports only properties. If method support is needed in future, this should derive from Adapter class.
The Adapter registration is done in monad\src\singleshell\installer\MshManagementMshSnapin.cs
